However , the Mavericks ( 2 - 10 ) battled back in the second period , outscoring the Mavericks ( 2 - 10 ) by a 29 - 16 margin in the final 12 minutes . Jonathan Gibson led the way for the Mavericks with a game - high 26 points , which he supplemented with six rebounds , three assists and two steals . Serge Ibaka was right behind him with 15 points , nine rebounds , an assist , three blocks and a steal . Jeff Matthews was right behind him with 13 points , four rebounds and two assists . Nikola Vucevic was right behind him with a 12 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a block . Bismack Biyombo managed a 13 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and three blocks . Andrew Bogut was productive in a reserve role as well with eight points , eight rebounds , an assist and four blocks . The Magic remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division . They 're home again Sunday for a date with the Utah Jazz .

The Warriors shot 52 percent from the field and 47 percent from long range , as they cruised to the win . Along with the strong start , the Spurs were able to shoot 48 percent from the field and 56 percent from the three - point line , while the Grizzlies went 46 percent from the floor and 42 percent from beyond the arc . Gasol finished with 28 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 10 - 11 FT ) , 12 rebounds and four blocked shots , while Conley had 23 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) and 10 assists . He 's now averaging 16 points and 6 assists on the year . The only other starter to reach double figures in points was Tony Parker , who scored 14 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 23 minutes . The Spurs ' next game will be on the road against the San Antonio Spurs on Wednesday , while the Grizzlies will travel to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Friday .

The Thunder were led by the duo of Russell Westbrook and Kevin Durant . Westbrook went 8 - for - 20 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 20 points , while also adding 15 rebounds and 10 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 20 points and 12 rebounds . Durant on the other hand went 11 - for - 16 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 26 points , while also adding 13 rebounds and six assists . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 20 points and 11 rebounds . The Thunder 's next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Sixers will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Friday .

Zach Randolph was right behind him with a 19 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a steal . Gorgui Dieng contributed a 12 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , two steals and a block . Deyonta Dunn was productive in a reserve role as well with eight points , four rebounds , an assist and a steal . Karl-Anthony Towns led the way for the Timberwolves with 21 points , five assists , four rebounds , a steal and a block . Ricky Rubio was next with a modest four points , eight assists and four rebounds . Tony Allen and James Ennis registered matching N/A - point efforts , with the former adding eight rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks , and the latter supplying six rebounds and a steal . Vince Carter ( three points , seven rebounds , an assist , a steal and a block ) and JaMychal Green ( 12 points , seven rebounds , an assist and a block ) were productive off the bench .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 113 - 113 , at Target Center on Monday . The Timberwolves ( 19 - 33 ) learned earlier in the day that they 'd have a chance to extend their win streak to four games , as they jumped out to a 33 - 33 lead after one quarter . However , the Timberwolves ( 19 - 33 ) managed to outscore their hosts by a 33 - 33 margin over the second and third periods , and managed to outscore Minnesota 31 - 15 in the final period . Karl-Anthony Towns led the way for Minnesota with a game - high 35 points , which he supplemented with eight rebounds , two steals and a block . Andrew Wiggins followed with 27 points , four rebounds and two steals . Goran Dragic was right behind him with 33 points , nine assists , two rebounds and a steal . Hassan Whiteside posted a 19 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , a steal and a block . Ricky Rubio was right behind him with 14 points , 13 assists , three rebounds and two steals . Dion Waiters tallied 12 points , five assists , three rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Gorgui Dieng was productive in a reserve role as well with 13 points , seven rebounds and a steal . The Timberwolves remain in last place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They 're home again on Monday for a date with the Utah Jazz .

The Bulls were the superior shooters in this game , going 38 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons went 38 percent from the floor and just 21 percent from beyond the arc . The Bulls were the superior shooters in this game , going 41 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons went 38 percent from the floor and just 21 percent from beyond the arc . The Bulls were led by the duo of Nikola Mirotic and Marcus Morris . Mirotic finished with 22 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and six rebounds , while Morris finished with 26 points ( 10 - 15 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 9 FT ) and seven rebounds . He 's had a very strong stretch of three games , averaging 21 points , 9 rebounds and 2 assists over that span . Marcus Morris was the other starter to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 26 points ( 10 - 15 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 9 FT ) , seven rebounds and two assists . The 26 points were a new season - high for the forward , while the double - double was his first since the end of January . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Pistons will travel to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Friday .

They 're home again Sunday for a date with the Utah Jazz .

The New York Knicks defeated the Detroit Pistons , 105 - 102 , at Madison Square Garden on Monday . These are two teams going in opposite directions right now and this result shows just that . In fact , the Knicks led for the majority of the game , as they led by double - digits for the entirety of the second half . Defense was key for New York , as they held the Pistons to 49 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range . The Pistons also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 52 - 40 . The Pistons ( 6 - 6 ) have now won three - straight games , as they continue to slide down the standings . Kristaps Porzingis did all he could for Detroit , as he led the team with 35 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Tobias Harris was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 19 points and 10 rebounds . Jon Leuer was a nice spark off the bench , providing 17 points and nine rebounds on 7 - of - 11 shooting .
